Sophia Kesteven from @TechZeroTF spoke to Ben Knight from @GoCardless, Tara Seshan from @Watershed, and Jimmy Cockerton from @Microsoft, about the benefits of integrating sustainability into tech businesses and what steps companies can take to reduce their emissions.

Hear from thought leaders, climate tech specialists & leading tech companies who have embedded net zero into the core of their business:

 Ben Knight, @GoCardless
 Sophia Kesteven, @TechZeroTF
 Jimmy Cockerton, @Microsoft
 Tara Seshan, @watershed
